plan1.title: WBL Collaborative
plan1.description: WBL Collaborative is an Online Collaborative Project-Based Learning Application designed to support collaborative learning online, with a project-based learning approach. This application allows students and teachers to work together in a virtual environment, complete challenging tasks, and develop skills such as teamwork, communication, and problem solving.

content.title: Collaborative Discussion
content.description: The collaborative discussion forum facility allows students to interact across departments, ask questions, provide responses, and collaborate on problem solving.

content.title: Availability of Materials
content.description: Ensuring accessibility of learning materials around the clock, from anywhere. Whether it's videos, e-books, or quizzes, all materials can be accessed at any time that suits the student's needs.

content.title: Gamification
content.description: Delivering a more fun and motivating learning experience through gamification. Students who actively participate in discussions and complete assignments will be rewarded with badges, levels or rewards.

content.title: Faculty of Computer Science
content.description: The Faculty of Computer Science offers programs in Computer Engineering, Information Systems, and Information Technology. The faculty is equipped with state-of-the-art laboratories and experienced faculty members.

content.title: Faculty of Engineering
content.description: The Faculty of Engineering offers programs in Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Civil Engineering. The faculty is equipped with state-of-the-art laboratories and experienced faculty members.

content.title: Faculty of Economics
content.description: The Faculty of Economics offers programs in Management, Accounting, and Development Economics. The faculty is equipped with state-of-the-art laboratories and experienced faculty members.

content.title: Education Information System
content.description: Education Information System is a course that focuses on the development and implementation of information systems in the field of education.

content.title: Information Technology Project Management
content.description: Information Technology Project Management is a course that focuses on the management of information technology projects, including planning, execution, and evaluation.

content.title: Animation Techniques
content.description: Animation Techniques is a course that focuses on the principles and techniques of animation, including 2D and 3D animation.
